line: The moment you doubt whether you can fly, you cease forever to be able to do it.
author: J.M. Barrie

line: Time you enjoy wasting is not wasted time.
author: Marthe Troly-Curtin

line: When you canâ€™t find someone to follow, you have to find a way to lead by example.
author: Tahereh Mafi

line: When you start to love yourself for the first time, your scars start to look a lot more like beauty marks.
author: Jacob Tobia

line: All we have to decide is what to do with the time that is given to us.
author: J.R.R Tolkien
